item.title: There is increasing interest in cold pressed juices
item.description:
Source: Techsci Research. A TechSci Research report projects the global cold-pressed juice market to experience a significant growth rate, exceeding 10% annually, between 2016 and 2022. This anticipated growth is attributed to several factors, including increased disposable incomes, heightened consumer awareness, effective marketing campaigns by industry leaders, widespread product availability, and a strong global distribution network. Global GDP per capita, adjusted for purchasing power parity, rose from US$14,020.31 in 2012 to US$15,470...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/there-is-increasing-interest-in-cold-pressed-juices/

item.title: Organic cosmetics are becoming increasingly popular
item.description:
A new report from TechSci Research, titled Global Organic Cosmetics Market By Product Type, By Point of Sale, By Region, Competition Forecast and Opportunities, 2011 - 2021, reveals that the global organic cosmetics market is expected to experience significant growth through 2021. This growth is driven by rising health concerns and a growing awareness of the negative effects of conventional cosmetic chemicals, coupled with the benefits offered by organic alternatives...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/organic-cosmetics-are-becoming-increasingly-popular/

item.title: TechSci Research believes that the organic dairy market has significant potential
item.description:
A recent report by TechSci Research, a global management consulting firm, predicts significant growth in the global organic dairy products market. Driven by factors like increased health consciousness, a growing urban population, and rising spending on organic foods, the market is expected to achieve a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of over 11% between 2016 and 2021. The report, titled Global Organic Dairy Products Market By Product Type, By Region, Competition Forecast and Opportunities, 2011 - 2021, identifies expanding product lines, readily available organic dairy products, strong distribution networks, increasing internet access, and proactive marketing strategies from key players as contributing factors to this projected growth...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/techsci-research-believes-that-the-organic-dairy-market-has-significant-potential/
